titlealts.searchtitle: NHS Business Definition: Emergency Ambulance - Description

body.p: An Emergency Ambulance is an AMBULANCE VEHICLE .

An Emergency Ambulance , also referred to as a Double Crewed Ambulance (Emergency) , is a fully equipped and liveried Ambulance , crewed by ambulance staff trained to deliver clinical care at the scene of an Ambulance Incident and capable of transporting the PATIENT to hospital or other location following a 999 call or a call from CARE PROFESSIONALS .
